name: Airtable Tool
semantic_context: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable
natural_language_description: 这是 Airtable Tool 节点。主要用于: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: airtableTokenApi

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: record

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getMany
available_options: Get Many (值: getMany) - List all the bases
Get Schema (值: getSchema) - Get the schema of the tables in a base

base.name: base
base.description: The Airtable Base to retrieve the schema from
base.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base | 作用: The Airtable Base to retrieve the schema from | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: permissionLevel (值: None) - Filter the returned bases by one or more permission levels

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the record to get. More info.
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Record ID | 作用: ID of the record to get. More info. | (必填项)

filterByFormula.name: filterByFormula
filterByFormula.description: The formula will be evaluated for each record, and if the result is not 0, false, "", NaN, [], or #Error! the record will be included in the response. More info.
filterByFormula.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter By Formula | 作用: The formula will be evaluated for each record, and if the result is not 0, false, "", NaN, [], or #Error! the record will be included in the response. More info. | 提示: If empty, all the records will be returned

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Defines how the returned records should be ordered
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 作用: Defines how the returned records should be ordered | 默认值: {}
